Ayant accompagné plus de 650 sociétés da: Having accompanied more than 650 companies in their compliance needs, Moamen ELMASRY, founder of YVEA, makes available to you this white paper which compiles all the essential information on the different procedures, thus allowing you to fully master and understand this program.
Chaque destination d'importation a manda: Each importing destination has mandated one or more certification bodies to assist you in the conformity of your shipments. For example: ApPlus, Bureau Veritas, Cotecna, Intertek, QIMA, SGS, TUV, etc.
De plus en plus d'organismes proposent d: More and more organizations are offering videoconference inspections. We strongly recommend that you opt for this option, which allows you to obtain a date more quickly.
Déclaration d'importation à demander à v: Import declaration to be requested from your buyer (depending on the destination)
Fiche descriptive pour chaque code de no: Description sheet for each nomenclature code

La procédure la plus courante, appelée «: The most common procedure, called "Route A", is divided into three steps to be validated:
Le lieu d'inspection peut être situé n'i: The place of inspection can be located anywhere in the world, except the destination country.
Le programme de pré-vérification de la c: The Pre-Export Verification of Conformity (PVoC) programme is designed to verify the conformity of all regulated products exported to Ivory Coast with applicable national, regional or international standards.
Les inspections peuvent être effectuées: Inspections can be carried out in one of the following places: warehouse, hangar or at the freight forwarder.
L’exportateur (vendeur) doit valider ses: The exporter (seller) must validate his documents and have his goods inspected by a certification body mandated by the destination country in order to obtain a Certificate of Conformity (CoC). Without this certificate, the goods cannot be recovered by the buyer and risk being destroyed!
Rapports de test ou certificats d'analys: Test reports or certificates of analysis for each nomenclature code
Une fois les étapes 1 et 2 validées, l'o: Once steps 1 and 2 have been validated, the certification body will send us your certificate for verification and validation
